verbs.description: [ARG0: Hatch] [V: said] , “ [ARG1: [ Trump ] would be a very interesting speaker and would do a good job for John] . ”

Hatch said , “ [ARG1: [ Trump ]] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] [ARG2: a very interesting speaker] and would do a good job for John . ”
Hatch said , “ [ Trump ] would be a very interesting speaker and [V: would] do a good job for John . ”
